SEARCH
Package HMS.Manager

Class MedicalRecordManager

java.lang.Object
HMS.Manager.MedicalRecordManager
public class MedicalRecordManager extends Object
Manages the loading, saving, and manipulation of medical records within the hospital management system.

    • findRecordByAppointmentId

      public static MedicalRecord findRecordByAppointmentId(String appointmentID)
      Finds a medical record by appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to find the record for.
      Returns:
      The medical record if found, null otherwise.

    • findRecordsByPatientId

      public static List<MedicalRecord> findRecordsByPatientId(String patientID)
      Retrieves all medical records for a specific patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of medical records for the specified patient.
